short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Lấy URL, title và content được bôi đậm gửi về Google Sheet

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Effortlessly gather and organize content from across the web with our powerful new Chrome extension. Designed for productivity enthusiasts and content managers alike, this tool is your one-stop solution for capturing text, images, and videos directly into Google Sheets.

Why choose this extension?

* Streamlined Workflow: Say goodbye to tedious copy-paste routines. With just a few clicks, you can transfer valuable content from various platforms straight to your spreadsheets.
* Enhanced Organization: Automatically categorize and store your collected data in Google Sheets, making it easy to access, edit, and analyze anytime.
* Time-Saving: Reduce the clutter of switching between tabs and apps. Our extension simplifies your data collection, letting you focus on what truly matters—creating impactful content.

Ideal for marketers, researchers, and digital enthusiasts looking to boost their productivity and content management efficiency. Install today and transform the way you gather and use digital information!
